summary: All requested frontend additions appear implemented: a new /introduction route and page using the Prose reading style, Introduction links added to both header (desktop + mobile) and footer, and clearer admin Works upload discoverability via Admin dashboard navigation, a visible Upload Work button on the Works admin page, an upload form that returns to the Works list on success, and improved AdminGuard messaging for non-admin/non-authenticated users.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified footer attribution linking to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking (and a heart icon), which is not requested by the BuildRequest requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-15/16/18 only require adding an Introduction link and keeping footer styling functional/consistent; no requirement mentions adding or changing third-party attribution/UTM links.
